Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-6923 affecting package python3 for versions less than 3.12.3-3
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-6923 affecting package python3 for versions less than 3.12.3-3. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package python3 is earlier than 3.12.3-3, affected by CVE-2024-6923
